meanings.definition: Passed through a filter to remove impurities
meanings.sent1: She filtered the water to make it clean for drinking.
meanings.sent2: The coffee was filtered to remove the coffee grounds.
meanings.sent3: He tried to filter out the bad jokes from his stand-up routine.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a sieve, filtering out unnecessary information.
meanings.sent5: The air purifier filtered out the dust particles, making the room fresh.

meanings.definition: Processed or altered to remove unwanted elements
meanings.sent1: The filtered coffee had a smooth taste.
meanings.sent2: The data was carefully filtered to remove errors.
meanings.sent3: The filtered photos looked much better after editing.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts felt filtered, as if she was holding back.
meanings.sent5: The filtered sunlight through the trees created a beautiful pattern on the ground.

meanings.definition: Displayed or sorted based on specific criteria
meanings.sent1: The search results were filtered to show only relevant information.
meanings.sent2: The emails were filtered into different folders for easy access.
meanings.sent3: She filtered her wardrobe to find the perfect outfit for the party.
meanings.sent4: His memories were filtered through the lens of nostalgia.
meanings.sent5: The artist filtered the colors to create a harmonious composition.
